If you're up for a swashbuckling adventure with a female pirate at its heart, "Cutthroat Island" is another great choice! Starring Geena Davis and Matthew Modine, it's a thrilling tale of piracy on the high seas in search of hidden treasure. Enjoy!

If you're interested in delving into a more historical context, "Amen." might also appeal to you. This film follows the true story of a SS officer trying to inform Pope Pius XII about the atrocities happening during WWII, with Ulrich Mühe delivering a powerful performance as the central character. Enjoy your movie time!

If you're in the mood for a suspenseful drama with Kenneth Branagh, you might enjoy "Valkyrie" – a gripping account of a daring plot against Adolf Hitler during World War II, featuring an impressive ensemble cast including Tom Cruise and Kenneth Branagh himself.

On the other hand, if you're looking for something more light-hearted and humorous, "Zack and Miri Make a Porno" might be right up your alley! This quirky comedy, written by Stephen Chbosky, explores the unexpected romantic feelings between two lifelong friends as they attempt to make an adult film together.
